pageContext.claim: “I'm also thrilled to say that we have secured for our military servicemembers and their families the largest -- you don't really want it, you're too patriotic for this -- the largest pay raise in almost a decade. Largest pay raise.”
pageContext.analysis: Congress passed a pay raise, the largest in eight years, that was higher than what Trump requested. The 2.4 percent figure is also the mark mandated as the standard pay raise under federal law.
